regular-body:
Today was surprisingly filled with Beatles references, including:

  1. A friend quoting Strawberry Fields Forever on Facebook.
  2. A friend listening to Rubber Soul.
  3. A friend mentioning that Eleanor Rigby was under-rated.
And my personal favourite: a friend in class hit a key on his laptop by mistake and started the very distinctive riff to an early (i.e. pre-Revolver) Beatles song. If only I could remember which one. Any Beatles references you’d like to make to start Wednesday off right?
